Movie Moster displays a list of the twenty most popular movies as determined by The Movie DB (TMDB). The movies are displayed by popularity from most to least popular. For each movie, the title, poster, overview, and genre (first listing only) are displayed. Volley is used to request and retrieve the data from TMDB web api. GSON is used to parse the movie data. Glide is used for image management.
